features: [16 Inch Large Underbed Storage Space] Weehom metal bed frame queen is built with 14'' under-bed clearance space for storing stuff and easy cleaning, which keeps your room tidy and clean.

[No Box Spring Needed] Metal bed frame queen of reliable steel slats to form a sturdy supportive foundation, add better supports to your mattress without the use of a box spring. This frame simplifies the purchase process to save time in matching spring boxes.

[Heavy Duty Full Bed Frame] Weehom bed frame queen size build with 9 strong legs and 12 heavy-duty steel slats, which can bearing 600 LBS and providing maximum stability.Spaced metal slats that allow the mattress to breathe, preventing sagging to increase mattress life.

[Easy Assembly] Weehom queen bed frames with Integrated compact design, easily set up in less than an hour. All parts, tools, and instructions are shipped straight to your door in one efficiently packed box.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Weehom Morden Platform Bed Frame Mattresses are no small investment, so it makes sense that you would want to do everything in your power to ensure that your mattress lasts its full lifetime. A bed frame acts as the backbone of your mattress, therefore, it is an essential component of your bed. One of the most hassle-free ways to extend the life of your mattress and prevent sagging is to purchase a quality bed frame. Weehom Queen Size bed frame features sturdy metal construction with a solid base to hold a weight of up to 770 pounds.They have spaced metal slats that allow the mattress to breathe, while also supporting the weight of the bed and the sleepers. More importantly, this bed frame do not require a box spring. It is great to work with memory foam, spring, and hybrid mattresses. Plus, it helps you maximize a limited bedroom area by providing ample space for storage under the bed. Add a few cute storage boxes to your cart and you’ll have a stylish and well-organized bedroom.

Weehom Furniture Weehom is a growing furniture brand which that mainly provides superior quality modern home/office products such as bed frame, computer desks,bookshelf etc. Weehom will work with you to create a comfortable and warm home together. Main Features 14 Inch Large Underbed Storage SpaceSpace-saving and storage-friendlyNo Box Spring NeededEasy AssemblyAffordable option with superior qualitySteady and non-skid construction for a safe sleepMorden Minimalist style Who Is This Bed Frame Best For? Heavy users Users wanting easy assembly Light sleepers who don’t want a loud, squeaky bed Users wanting extra storage space under the bed

Heavy Duty Queen Bed Frame Weehom bed frame build with 9 strong legs and 12 heavy-duty steel slats, providing maximum stability and durability. Stable Structure The improved construction makes this bed easier to install. Each metal slat is evenly stressed, reducing frictional noise and providing a quiet sleep. Protective Foot Pads Anti-slip plastic foot pads protect your floor from scratches.

Specifications Material: MetalColor: BlackBedframe Dimension: 82.28''*61.42''*15.75''(L*W*H)Package Dimension: 65.75''*7.48''*3.35''(L*W*H)Maximum Capacity: 770lbs Package Include 1 x Bed Frame1 x InstructionsAll parts, tools, and instructions are shipped in one efficiently packed box.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars buy like coasters or something bc it slides if you have wooden floors
reviews.reviewText: it’s great, stable just need to make sure u have something that stops it from sliding

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to install
reviews.reviewText: This came damaged by UPS - who conveniently ripped the box and directionsEven without the actual directions I was able to put it all together in 30 min just by laying it all out and putting 2+2 together - super sturdy and very nice!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Didn’t last 8 months
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get an inexpensive frame that looked sturdy. It was a little trying to get together due to some parts being pretty tight but it’s manageable. However, the middle legs are all bent after less than 8 months of use. It’s now in the dump. I tried contacting the company who supposedly sells this because it says to check them for warranty info but I can’t find any form of contact. I left a review for them to see but received no reply or acknowledgment. Waste of money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad, but a little wobbly
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was mostly fairly simple until I got to the slats. We had to twist them slightly to get them in. Unsure if this is on purpose or ours was slightly off. If you don't have a lot of upper arm strength, this would be really difficult. Now that it is put together, it has a about 1/2 inch of a wiggle to it but all the screws seem locked in tight. Overall, it seems to be holding up, but it is a little less sturdy than I had hoped. The whole bed moves when I roll over in bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assambly
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assembly, the price is fair for what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect bed frame!
reviews.reviewText: This bed make’s ZERO noise at all! Love the height of it too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: Bought this frame for my daughter king size bed! Its easy to put together & its very firm & heavy duty as described!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Poor material, not stable
reviews.reviewText: This frame is very weak, swings side by side. Barely can hold 2 persons
